name: James Falukner
comment: The Warehouse Gadget world is such a gem so helpful, kind and considerate. After trying three stores previously & getting not very good customer service over the phone this little beauty Maddison was such a delight to deal with I honestly can’t wait to go into the store because of her. She’s Such an asset to The warehouse.

name: Andrew Flintoff
comment: We had an issue with an appliance which took a lot of resolving with the suppliers. Kim at the Warehouse Whanganui sorted it for us, making a frustrating situation so much easier with her professionalism and persistence. We are so appreciative of the hard work she put in, and her willingness to go the extra mile for us. Give that girl a pay rise!

name: Christofer Billis
comment: I purchased an iMac-2022 for the work place. It was delivered on time and very quickly from the point of ordering.The product quality is very good and is great for its purpose. Self-assembly instructions were user friendly.

name: Hyden Walsh
comment: For my house cloth wash I needed a washing machine , and The Warehouse had a perfect selection of options, plus a multitude of choices for the binders themselves. Highly recommended, and the machine came two days early, which was bonus!!
